text: A Comrade's Honour () is a 1953 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolay Lebedev.ЧЕСТЬ ТОВАРИЩАЧесть товарища (1953) It stars Konstantin Skorobogatov, Boris Kokovkin, and Gennadiy Michurin. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1953 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikolay Lebedev Category:Soviet drama movies
title: A Comrade's Honour
